b'Usavich Special': b'Usavich (\xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xb5\xe3\x83\x93\xe3\x83\x83\xe3\x83\x81) (from Japanese \xe3\x81\x86\xe3\x81\x95\xe3\x81\x8e "usagi", rabbit, with "vich" giving it faux Russian flavor) is a series of animated short films being produced for MTV Japan by Kanaban Graphics. It\'s about an odd couple of rabbits imprisoned in a Russian prison. While the first season (1-13 eps) shows the absurd everyday occurrences of the two rabbits\' prison life, the second season (14-26 eps) tells the adventures of their escape and life on the run.\n\n(Source: AnimeDB)'
